verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David בָּרֲכִ֣י <WH1288> ba-ra-Chi Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all קְ֝רָבַ֗י <WH7130> ke-ra-Vai, and all that is within אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem name קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. me [bless] his holy

בָּרֲכִ֣י <WH1288> ba-ra-Chi Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nay תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י <WH7911> tish-ke-Chi, and forget כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner גְּמוּלָֽיו׃ <WH1576> ge-mu-Lav. not all his benefits

הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ <WH5545> has-so-Le-ach Who forgiveth לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all עֲוֹנֵ֑כִי <WH5771> 'a-vo-Ne-chi; all thine iniquities הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א <WH7495> ha-ro-Fe, who healeth לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all תַּחֲלֻאָֽיְכִי׃ <WH8463> ta-cha-lu-'A-ye-chi. all thy diseases

הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל <WH1350> hag-go-'El Who redeemeth מִשַּׁ֣חַת <WH7845> mish-Sha-chat from destruction חַיָּ֑יְכִי <WH2416> chai-Ya-ye-chi; thy life הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי <WH5849> ham-'at-te-Re-chi, who crowneth חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed thee with lovingkindness וְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <WH7356> ve-ra-cha-Mim. and tender mercies

הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יַע <WH7646> ham-mas-Bi-ya' Who satisfieth בַּטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> bat-Tov with good עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ <WH5716> 'ed-Yech; thy mouth תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH2318> tit-chad-Desh is renewed כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר <WH5404> kan-Ne-sher like the eagle's נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃ <WH5271> ne-'u-Ra-ye-chi. [things so that] thy youth

עֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh executeth צְדָק֣וֹת <WH6666> tze-da-Kot righteousness יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tim, and judgment לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃ <WH6231> 'a-shu-Kim. for all that are oppressed

יוֹדִ֣יעַ <WH3045> yo-Di-a' He made known דְּרָכָ֣יו <WH1870> de-ra-Chav his ways לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> le-mo-Sheh; unto Moses לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei unto the children יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel עֲלִילֽוֹתָיו׃ <WH5949> a-li-Lo-tav. his acts

רַח֣וּם <WH7349> ra-Chum [is] merciful וְחַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> ve-chan-Nun and gracious יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD אֶ֖רֶךְ <WH750> 'E-rech slow אַפַּ֣יִם <WH639> 'ap-Pa-yim to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> ve-rav- and plenteous חָֽסֶד׃ <WH2617> Cha-sed. in mercy

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor לָנֶ֥צַח <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach He will not always יָרִ֑יב <WH7378> ya-Riv; chide וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [his anger] for ever יִטּֽוֹר׃ <WH5201> yit-Tor. neither will he keep

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ <WH2399> Cha-cha-ta-'ei-nu with us after our sins עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah He hath not dealt לָ֑נוּ La-nu; וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor כַ֝עֲוֹנֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH5771> cha-'a-vo-no-Tei-nu, us according to our iniquities גָּמַ֥ל <WH1580> ga-Mal nor rewarded עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu. and

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki as כִגְבֹ֣הַּ <WH1361> chig-Vo-ah is high above שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma-yim For as the heaven עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are above הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the earth גָּבַ֥ר <WH1396> ga-Var [so] great חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do, is his mercy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- toward יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <WH3373> ye-re-'Av. toward them that fear

כִּרְחֹ֣ק <WH7368> kir-Chok As far as מִ֭זְרָח <WH4217> Miz-roch the east מִֽמַּֽעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> mi-ma-'a-Rav; is from the west הִֽרְחִ֥יק <WH7368> hir-Chik [so] far hath he removed מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu, at אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6588> pe-sha-'Ei-nu. our transgressions

כְּרַחֵ֣ם <WH7355> ke-ra-Chem pitieth אָ֭ב <WH1> 'av Like as a father עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> ba-Nim; [his] children רִחַ֥ם <WH7355> ri-Cham pitieth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [so] the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <WH3373> ye-re-'Av. them that fear

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu Himself יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> ya-Da' For he knoweth יִצְרֵ֑נוּ <WH3336> yitz-Re-nu; our frame זָ֝כ֗וּר <WH2142> za-Chur, he remembereth כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> 'a-Far that we [are] dust אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> 'a-Na-che-nu. ourselves

אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <WH376> 'E-noosh are like כֶּחָצִ֣יר <WH2682> ke-cha-Tzir [are] as grass יָמָ֑יו <WH3117> ya-Mav; his days כְּצִ֥יץ <WH6731> ke-Tzitz as a flower הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh, of the field כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken so יָצִֽיץ׃ <WH6692> ya-Tzitz. so he flourisheth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki When ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach For the wind עָֽבְרָה־ <WH5674> 'a-ve-rah- passeth over בּ֣וֹ bo וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <WH369> ve-'ei-Nen-nu; is no וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <WH5234> yak-ki-Ren-nu thereof shall know ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od longer מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> me-ko-Mo. it and it is gone and the place

וְחֶ֤סֶד <WH2617> ve-Che-sed But the mercy יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> me-'o-Lam [is] from everlasting וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- to ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> o-lom everlasting עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon יְרֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> ye-re-'Av; upon them that fear וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-To, him and his righteousness לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei unto children's בָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> va-Nim. children

לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> le-sho-me-Rei To such as keep בְרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> ve-ri-To; his covenant וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י <WH2142> u-le-zo-che-Rei and to those that remember פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו <WH6490> fik-ku-Dav, his commandments לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <WH6213> la-'a-so-Tam. to do

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> Bash-sha-ma-yim in the heavens הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> he-Chin hath prepared כִּסְא֑וֹ <WH3678> kis-'O; his throne וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ <WH4438> u-mal-chu-To, and his kingdom בַּכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> bak-Kol all מָשָֽׁלָה׃ <WH4910> ma-Sha-lah. ruleth

בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו <WH4397> mal-'A-Chav ye his angels גִּבֹּ֣רֵי <WH1368> gib-Bo-rei that excel כֹ֭חַ <WH3581> Cho-ach in strength עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> 'o-Sei that do דְבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> de-va-Ro; his commandments לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a', hearkening בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol unto the voice דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> de-va-Ro. of his word

בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh ye the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all צְבָאָ֑יו <WH6635> tze-va-'Av; all [ye] his hosts מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <WH8334> me-sha-re-Tav, [ye] ministers עֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> 'o-Sei of his that do רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> re-tzo-No. his pleasure

בָּרֲכ֤וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Bless יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- all מַעֲשָׂ֗יו <WH4639> ma-'a-Sav, all his works בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all מְקֹמ֥וֹת <WH4725> me-ko-Mot in all places מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ <WH4475> mem-shal-To; of his dominion בָּרֲכִ֥י <WH1288> ba-ra-Chi bless נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD
